Sunhawk doesn't bother circling this time he just flies South to look 
for a new place to set up a sensor.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> He got the comm message and reported to the bridge."Whats up, 
Talos? New orders?"
> 
> {Talos}
> Bridge
> 
>     Talos waited patiently til Blackknight/fang arrived on the 
bridge before he began, "Thanks to a new sensor enhancer setup by 
Condor and Sunhawk we've picked up the faint echo of a maximal 
distress beacon somewhere north of our location. By the state of the 
signal the pod most likely has been here for an extensive period of 
time, at least since the last beast wars involving Optimus Primal and 
his crew, likely it's one of his people forgotten during the 
conflicts."
> 
>     Swivelling the chair he touched a control on the arm rest, one 
of the functioning monitors brought up a small outline of the ship 
and the area in the general area including the expanded detection to 
the north. "I want you two to head generally north and see if you 
can't pick up the beacon more strongly out there since by the 
readings we're only getting an echo of the signal, this means it's 
definately outside our scanning and communication range by a decent 
amount. Find the pod and bring its occupant back. If you can manage 
the pod as well good, if not salvage what you can from it then 
destroy it. Unlike the original beast wars I don't want Megatron 
getting his hands on anything of our peoples."
> 
>     Nodding he shut off the display and turned back to regard the 
pair. "I'm hoping the protoform has survived even after all this 
time, but there's no guarantee that it will be functioning nor in any 
state to respond to you, I suggest arming yourselves just in case. In 
whatever happens good luck and I'll see you both when you get back."
